Levels 11-20.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 20| OR |Progressive Levels:1|) AND |@Zones 10-20:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 20| OR |Progressive Levels:1|) AND |@Zones 10-20:2|)

Levels 21-30.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 30| OR |Progressive Levels:2|) AND |@Zones 20-30:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 30| OR |Progressive Levels:2|) AND |@Zones 20-30:2|)

Levels 31-40.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 40| OR |Progressive Levels:3|) AND |@Zones 30-40:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 40| OR |Progressive Levels:3|) AND |@Zones 30-40:2|)

Levels 41-50.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 50| OR |Progressive Levels:4|) AND |@Zones 40-50:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 50| OR |Progressive Levels:4|) AND |@Zones 40-50:2|)

Levels 51-60.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 60| OR |Progressive Levels:5|) AND |@Zones 50-60:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 60| OR |Progressive Levels:5|) AND |@Zones 50-60:2|)

Levels 61-70.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:2| AND |Hellfire Peninsula (58-63)|)

Levels 71-80.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:2| AND (|Borean Tundra (68-72)| OR |Howling Fjord (68-72)|))

Levels 81-85.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:2| AND (|Mount Hyjal (80-82)| OR |Vashj'ir (80-82)|))

Levels 86-90.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:2| AND |The Jade Forest (85-86)|)

Leveling.requires: ({YamlCompare(expansion == 0)} AND (({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 60| OR |Progressive Levels:5|) AND |@Zones 50-60:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 60| OR |Progressive Levels:5|) AND |@Zones 50-60:2|))) OR ({YamlCompare(expansion == 1)} AND (({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:2| AND |Hellfire Peninsula (58-63)|))) OR ({YamlCompare(expansion == 2)} AND (({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:2| AND (|Borean Tundra (68-72)| OR |Howling Fjord (68-72)|)))) OR ({YamlCompare(expansion == 3)} AND (({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:2| AND (|Mount Hyjal (80-82)| OR |Vashj'ir (80-82)|)))) OR ({YamlCompare(expansion == 4)} AND (({YamlDisabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:1|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_transitions)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:2| AND |The Jade Forest (85-86)|)))
